definitions.definition: a vegetable of the onion family with a very strong taste and smell, used in cooking to add taste to food

examples.text: a **clove of garlic** *(= one section of it)*
Fry the chopped onion and crushed garlic for 3 minutes.

wordOrigin: Old English gārlēac, from gār ‘spear’ (because the shape of a clove resembles the head of a spear) + lēac ‘leek’.
